content: Yes it has been permanent. The "A-ha" moment for me was around three years ago and this psychological state has been exactly the same since. I'll just add that it isn't an experience you are like "oh man, that experience was so crazy that it changed who I am", it is a physiological snap that coincides with the end of your beliefs. Another dumb analogy I thought of is it's like a mermaid being like "oh shit I got two legs in here, I can just separate them and walk" and all the other mermaids are like "dude, idk, what if they fuse back together and you forget or something and can't walk anymore maybe it's just a phase" it just doesn't make much sense that way.
